mapper.insert: insert into notice (seq,type,title,content,write_date, view_cnt) value(#{seq},#{type},#{title},#{content}, now(),#{view_cnt})
mapper.select: select seq, title, type, write_date, view_cnt, content from notice where seq=#{seq}
mapper.update: update notice set view_cnt=view_cnt+1 where seq=#{seq}
update notice set title = #{title}, type = #{type}, content = #{content} where seq = #{seq}
